lead_paragraph: A picture caption on Tuesday with an article about Lance Armstrong’s plans for the 2009 Tour de France, using information provided by Agence France-Presse — Getty Images, misidentified the cyclist shown with him. Although it was a fellow rider on Team Astana, it was not Alberto Contador, the 2007 Tour winner. (The Times has been unable to identify the cyclist.).
